comments:
Set a bookmark on Grid, BIRT thows error message

Steps to reproduce:
1. create a blank report
2. New a grid in outline view And select the grid in editor. 
3. Go to property editor, Select "Bookmark", set "a"

Expected results:
Bookmark is set to the grid without error message.

Actual result:
"a" is set to the grid but BIRT throws error message:
WARNING: Prevented recursive attempt to activate part org.eclipse.pde.runtime.LogView while still in the middle of activating part org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.editors.ReportEditor

Exception stack tree is as following:

The error message is recursive displayed in error log if I do not close the Error window.
This problem still happened when I set TOC on Grid as "Grid1"

This bug can by no means reproduced on BIRT started up from workspace in eclipse 3.3, and no warning messages are shown when setting bookmark or TOC. It only appears on BIRT daily build. 
However, operating bookmark or TOC does cause problem, I have reported in bug 160835 and fixed it.
Wait for new daily build to see if this bug also disappear after checking in 160835's fix.
This bug doesn't appear on latest build based on eclipse 3.2.1. It still needs to see on build based on eclipse 3.3.
Change status to fixed. It could be reopened if it appears again when BIRT is built based on eclipse 3.3

traces.message: WARNING: Prevented recursive attempt to activate part org.eclipse.pde.runtime.LogView while still in the middle of activating part org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.editors.ReportEditor
